name: Pixel Miner
description:
"The revolution" they called it.

"Everything will be better" they said.
...
Now we don't even have our own pixels anymore

------------------------------------------

HOW TO PLAY

Use arrow keys to control

Press SPACE to interact

You goal is to obtain RGB and trade it for pixels in order to unlock screen real state. You can obtain Blue bytes from mining in the beginning, and trade it for Red and Green bytes.  Bring your RGB to the Pixel Machine in order to transform them into pixels and unlock new tiles. As you unlock other screens you will find other ways to earn RGB.
